pr_title: Use a thread safe class for holding header values

timeline.message: Use a thread safe class for holding header values

timeline.bodyText: Won't this kill performance for high qps applications ?
timeline.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: We could synchronize the methods instead, I guess.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Can't use a syncrhonizedMap, as this class implements Map itself, and exposes all views of the underlying map.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Ah, there are unsynchronized ArrayList objects in the map, so need to do something about them as well.
replies.author: jonmv
